Headline: 3 men arrested for affray after brawl draws large crowd in Geylang
Text: Submitted by Stomper RandyThis story was submitted via Stomp App contribution.This story was submitted via Stomp App contribution.Three men, aged between 37 and 50, were arrested over a fight that broke out in Geylang in the early hours of Sunday (June 13).Responding to a Stomp query, the police said they were alerted to a fight along Lorong 10 Geylang at 12.51am.When police officers arrived, there were no longer signs of a fight.Three men were subsequently arrested for affray.A video posted on Facebook shows a brawl breaking out among several men.A second video shows numerous onlookers observing the dispute, some of whom can be seen recording the incident with their mobile phonesPolice investigations are ongoing.Get more of Stomp's latest updates by following us on Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, Instagram and YouTube.View the discussion thread.View the discussion thread.Download the new STOMP app today.SPH Digital News | The Straits TimesAll rights reserved | Terms & Conditions | Data Protection Policy | Advertise with usSPH Digital News / STOMP / Copyright (c) 2019 Singapore Press Holdings Ltd.
